verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Teach us to pray
That we may cause
The enemy to flee
That we his evil
Pow'r may bind
His priosoners to free

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Teach us to pray
And firmly stand
Upon the battleground
To fight and break
The stronghold down
The enemy confound

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Teach us to pray
And use Thy rod
In strong prevailing prayer
Beneath Thy blood
To shake the earth
And powers of the air

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
By prayer and faith
O may we learn
To labor Lord with Thee
To know the victory is ours
And Thine authority
